New Records: CJ McCollum scored 50 points in the Pelicans' 132-120 win over the Washington Wizards
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans are 1-15 on the road.
New Orleans averages 14.2 turnovers per game and is 5-10 when winning the turnover battle.
The Wizards average 109.3 points per game, 8.7 fewer points than the 118.0 the Pelicans give up.
The Wizards average 107.4 points per game, 14.8 fewer points than the 122.2 the Wizards allow to opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards are 5-13 on their home court.
Washington allows 122.2 points to opponents and has been outscored by 12.9 points per game.
The Pelicans are 5-10 when winning the turnover battle.
Yves Missi is scoring 9.4 points per game and averaging 8.5 rebounds for the Pelicans.
Jordan Poole is scoring 21.8 points per game with 2.7 rebounds and 5.0 assists for the Wizards.
Others: Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Marvin Bagley III: out (knee), Bilal Coulibaly: day to day (illness) for the Wizards.
Brandon Ingram: out (ankle), Zion Williamson: out (hamstring), Karlo Matkovic: out (back) for the Pelicans.
